close.msg2: 試Not all data has been submitted. If you exit this page, it will be lost.

locked.heading: 試Locked
locked.msg: 試This form or record is locked and submissions cannot be saved.

validationerror.msg: 試You must address all errors on this form before it can be marked complete. Please update the value or add a query for each field marked in red.

relevantvalidationerror.msg: 試Response(s) in some field(s) make some data on this form invalid. This must be corrected to mark the form complete.

reasonforchangevalidationerror.msg: 試For each changed field a reason for change has to be provided. Please add any missing reasons.

stricterror.msg: 試Please enter a suitable value to update the field.

msg: 試It looks like some fields need attention

signatureservicenotavailable.msg: 試Signature service is currently not available. The question has been unchecked.

signatureservicefailed.msg: 試Signature not received. The question has been unchecked.

autoquery.msg1: 試Some field values have errors. These must be addressed before the form is closed.
msg2: 試Click Cancel to return to the form to manually update the value or add a query for each field marked in red.
試Click Proceed to continue closing the form now.  A query will be automatically added for each field marked in red.

complete.msg: 試Would you like to complete this record and exit?

leaveanyway.msg: 試Would you like to discard the changes and leave anyway?

reason.msg: 試If so, please enter a reason for deleting the group.

reason.heading: 試Looks like you've made some updates. Please tell us why:

reason.questionmsg: 試Please enter a reason for change at bottom of page.

deleteall.heading: 試WARNING
msg: 試This will delete all of your queued data and all of your forms from the browser storage. The data will be lost forever and the forms will not be usable until you are back online. Use this only if your browser storage seems corrupt.
試Before proceeding, please close all of your other Offline Form tabs. This page will reload. If you see an error, you may have to repeat this action.

print.heading: 試Options

repeatremove.msg: 試This action is irreversible (it will be recorded in the audit trail). Are you sure you want to proceed?

constraint.relevant: 試An answer has changed to another question that requires this question to be hidden, but we cannot hide it while it has data. Please clear out the data or modify the dependent answers.
